meanings.definition: A social gathering or event where food, especially buns, is served.
meanings.sent1: The school picnic turned into a bunfight with everyone enjoying the delicious buns.
meanings.sent2: The neighborhood block party was a bunfight with tables full of tasty treats.
meanings.sent3: At the family reunion, the bunfight got a bit messy when the kids started a bun-throwing contest.
meanings.sent4: The office potluck was a bunfight, with colleagues scrambling to grab their favorite snacks.
meanings.sent5: The wedding reception turned into a bunfight as guests eagerly lined up for the dessert table.

meanings.sent1: The protest turned into a bunfight as people started shouting and pushing.
meanings.sent2: The traffic jam was a complete bunfight with cars honking and drivers getting frustrated.
meanings.sent3: Trying to organize the event was a real bunfight with last-minute changes and confusion.
meanings.sent4: The classroom was a bunfight of noise and activity during the group project.
meanings.sent5: The emergency room was a bunfight of patients and medical staff trying to keep up with the rush.
